news.content: Glad that LLM-Planner that uses LLMs for embodied agent planning got accepted to ICCV'23!
Honored that our paper Pangu received the Outstanding Paper Award from ACL 2023!
6 papers accepted to ACL'23. Congrats to all the students and collaborators!
Grateful to receive support from NIH R01 for our research on AI and biomedicine!
Honored to receive support from President Johnson for our research on large language models!
Congratulations to Zhen Wang for a successful Ph.D. defense and for a postdoc position jointly hosted by UCSD/MBZUAI/CMU.

Congratulations to Xiang Deng for winning the prestigious Presidential Fellowship (Only 1 in CSE in 2022)! “The Presidential Fellowship is the most prestigious award given by the Graduate School. Recipients of this award embody the highest standards of scholarship in the full range of Ohio State’s graduate programs.”
Excited that our ArcaneQA paper won the Outstanding Paper Award at COLING'22 (top 15 out of 2253 submissions)!

OSU TacoBot team earned the third-place honor ($50K) in the first Alexa Prize TaskBot Challenge! 10 teams were selected worldwide out of 125 initiated applications to participate in the challenge in May 2021 and 5 teams were selected into finals in April 2022. We are the only US team in the top-3 performers! Check out our project website here.
Congratulations to Undergraduate Ron Chen for winning the University Fellowship and joining OSU NLP group as a Ph.D. student!
Congratulations to Ron Chen and Zhen Wang for winning the annual Undergraduate Research Award and Graduate Research Award in CSE, respectively!
Congratulations to Xiang Deng and Xiang Yue for winning the SIGMOD Research Highlight Award and the IEEE BIBM Best Paper Award, respectively!
